name: task-planner
description: A planning tool that asks clarifying questions before complex tasks

languageModelTools.name: plan
languageModelTools.modelDescription: MUST invoke when user references #plan. Benefits: (1) Analyzes workspace to understand project context, (2) Asks targeted clarifying questions through interactive UI, (3) Collects requirements about goals, scope, constraints, and success criteria, (4) Generates a detailed, structured task plan with clear steps, (5) Registers tasks to todo list for tracking. This ensures higher quality task execution by gathering all necessary information upfront.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Plan a complex task by answering clarifying questions

userRequest.description: Pass the user's EXACT input text as-is, without modification or expansion. Do NOT rephrase, elaborate, or add details. Example: if user types 'add tests', pass exactly 'add tests'.

todoToolName.description: The name of the todo tool to use for task registration (e.g., 'manage_todo_list', 'TodoWrite'). If not provided, defaults to 'manage_todo_list'.
